Html: Is there a chance we could get this built on the Sunburn Framework? I don't have Pro and won't purchase it just to try this demo, but I would really love to see it in action.
This version doesn't use sunburn at all - I removed the sunburn lighting so that there were no 3rd party dependencies for this release.

Hi - I'm having the same problem when trying to compile. You mentioned a version with no sunburn lighting but the only code I can see on here is from Nov. 4th. Is there another update that I'm missing?

Thanks.
with vse 2008 / xna 3.1 there is just a warning "The referenced component 'SynapseGaming-SunBurn-Pro-Processors' could not be found.  " but it works fine, its not needed by the code !
